page.title: 10A SCHOOLBOY'S WEDNESDAY
page.content: I wake up in the morning at approximately 6.00 a.m. I lie in bed for about an hour because my mum usually tells me off if I get up before 7.15. Around then I get up, get dressed and go downstairs. I let my dog (Sproggle) out and go into the the kitchen. I make two slices of toast for mum. When I've had my breakfast I go back upstairs and brush my teeth, get washed, go to the toilet and brush my hair.By that time it is 8.00 so mum and I put Sproggle in the boot of the car and drive to Stockton Cross which is where we meet Anthony and Will and Michael, who we share lifts with. We swap from my car to one of the other cars and drive to Orleton School. I get there about 8.43 and the bell for the beginning of school goes at 8.40. For the first lesson we have assembly. Then we do maths until 10.30, playtime
